name: Carl (n.s.chaitanya)
description:
Controls: 

  • Use arrow keys to move.  
  • Press X to skip a level.  
  • Press R to restart a level. 

Gameplay:  

  • Move from one tile to another collecting coins. 
  • Touch the dice to roll. The number generated will be the number of moves you get. 
  • Don't push the dice out of the tiles or leave them far behind! You need them to move forward.

Note:  I had less time, as I was working on another game at first. So I will update it with more levels and stuff like shurikens, monsters, etc. My original intention was to have a dice that gave the numbers on it based on the side that was facing up. But I ran into some trouble and had to make it random. 

Assets Used:

Character by Goldmetal.

Dice by kicked-in-teeth

Background Music:

8 Bit Nostalgia - By David Renda
